effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.platinum: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.platinum: The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn.
